pr_title: Add more pagination testing to query and relationship tests

timeline.message:
Add more pagination testing to query and relationship tests

Also update readme to reflect recent changes to project folder structure

timeline.bodyText: We deleted the local swagger copy, so we don't need this part of our readme anymore
timeline.author: timtay-microsoft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -59,11 +59,14 @@ You can familiarize yourself with different APIs using [samples for Digital Twin
 - The Digital Twins public sync and async clients [`DigitalTwinsClient`](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/digitaltwins/azure-digitaltwins-core/src/main/java/com/azure/digitaltwins/core/DigitalTwinsClient.java), [`DigitalTwinsAsyncClient`](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/digitaltwins/azure-digitaltwins-core/src/main/java/com/azure/digitaltwins/core/DigitalTwinsAsyncClient.java)
 - [`models` package](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/tree/master/sdk/digitaltwins/azure-digitaltwins-core/src/main/java/com/azure/digitaltwins/core/models)
 
-### /src/swagger

timeline.author: drwill-ms

timeline.bodyText:
Can this be something more like:
    assertThat("Number of pages must be more than 1",
           outgoingRelationshipsPagecount.get(),
           greaterThan(1));
In .NET at least, doing a comparison rather than asserting true or false gets you better test failure output.
timeline.author: drwill-ms

timeline.bodyText: weird spacing issues in this statement
timeline.author: drwill-ms

timeline.bodyText: The file names are strange aren't they? [1]? when did that happen? do you know why?
timeline.author: azabbasi

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure why its happening, but yeah I noticed that last week. They still seem to work fine though
replies.author: timtay-microsoft

replies.bodyText: It is an array of files, duh.
replies.author: drwill-ms

timeline.bodyText: hmm, I expected this to be the BULK_RELATIONSHIP_COUNT instead of pageSize
timeline.author: azabbasi

replies.bodyText: I think in this case you are only creating 5 relationships no? that's smaller than the default page size of 10
replies.author: azabbasi

replies.bodyText: Correct, I made a small mistake here. I was going to write this test the same way as the other pagination tests, but then I discovered we can't choose the page size here. I must have forgotten to revert this part after I made that discovery
replies.author: timtay-microsoft

timeline.author: abhipsaMisra
